derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin collocatio(n-), from collocare 'place together' (see collocate)

entry.tran: (语言学中指词语的)组合，搭配，连用
entry.def: In linguistics, collocation is the way that some words occur regularly whenever another word is used.

means.word_mean: 1. a grouping of words in a sentence
2. the act of positioning close together (or side by side);

sentences.sentence: "it is the result of the juxtaposition of contrasting colors"
